A curved bone is an item dropped by any monster that drop big bones, as well as Venenatis and Sotetseg. Curved bones are dropped at a universal rate of 1/5,012.5.[1]

Curved bones may be sold to Barlak, a Dorgesh-Kaan cave goblin, for 2,000 coins each. Dorgesh-Kaan can be accessed after the quest Death to the Dorgeshuun. The player will also be given a lecture on Construction, granting 6,750 Construction experience, as long as their Construction level is at least 30. If the player were to gain the same amount of experience by oak planks, it would cost them 52,312, which can be considered as an extra theoretical value of a curved bone. Handing in bones does NOT grant any experience if you are under 30 Construction.

Curved bones can be buried, but this is not recommended as they only give 15 experience for each bone buried (the same as big bones).

The bonecrusher will not automatically bury the bone, allowing the player to pick it up. Bones to Bananas and Bones to Peaches will not convert curved bones into fruit.

It would take 1,930 curved bones to go from level 30 to 99 Construction.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
12 April 2018
(update | poll)

The amount of Construction experience gained by giving curved bones to Barlak has been increased from 2,250 to 6,750.

[[File:Curved bone detail.png|left|180px]]
A '''curved bone''' is an item dropped by any monster that drop [[big bones]], as well as [[Venenatis]] and [[Sotetseg]]. Curved bones are dropped at a universal rate of 1/5,012.5.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/611450163178119168|date=18 June 2015|archiveurl=https://archive.fo/LRmgB|archivedate=26 October 2019|quote=1/400 for long, 1/5000 for curved *provided you didn't get a long bone*. So technically (399/400) * (1/5000) = 1/5012.5.}}

Curved bones may be sold to [[Barlak]], a [[Dorgesh-Kaan]] cave goblin, for 2,000 [[coins]] each. Dorgesh-Kaan can be accessed after the quest [[Death to the Dorgeshuun]]. The player will also be given a lecture on [[Construction]], granting 6,750 Construction [[experience]], as long as their Construction level is at least 30. If the player were to gain the same amount of experience by oak planks, it would cost them {{Coins|floor(6750/60*{{GEP|Oak plank}})}}, which can be considered as an extra theoretical value of a curved bone. '''Handing in bones does NOT grant any experience if you are under 30 Construction.'''

Curved bones can be buried, but this is not recommended as they only give 15 experience for each bone buried (the same as big bones).

The [[bonecrusher]] will '''not''' automatically bury the bone, allowing the player to pick it up. [[Bones to Bananas]] and [[Bones to Peaches]] will '''not''' convert curved bones into fruit.

It would take 1,930 curved bones to go from level 30 to 99 Construction.
